column1: NGR is from 1950s records and matched gauge shown on OS maps. Altitudes match.
June 1915, June 1921 and Oct 1922 readings amended in 1959!, without explanation; left in this record.

New and Old Gauge overlap by 15 months and 9 of the readings are duplicated, with all 7 of the last readings being duplicated. The other readings are very close to each other. The Old Gauge was probably discontinued earlier that the readings suggest
